5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\http\session\SessionObject;
7 use Ubiquity\controllers\Startup;
8 
16 class USession {
17  protected static $sessionInstance;
18 
26  public static function getArray($arrayKey) {
27  if (self::$sessionInstance->exists($arrayKey)) {
28  $array =self::$sessionInstance->get($arrayKey);
29  if (! is_array ( $array ))
30  $array = [ ];
31  } else
32  $array = [ ];
33  return $array;
34  }
35 
47  public static function addOrRemoveValueFromArray($arrayKey, $value, $add = null) {
48  $array = self::getArray ( $arrayKey );
49  $_SESSION [$arrayKey] = $array;
50  $search = array_search ( $value, $array );
51  if ($search === FALSE && $add) {
52  $array[]=$value;
53  self::$sessionInstance->set($arrayKey, $array);
54  return true;
55  } else if ($add !== true) {
56  unset ( $array[$search] );
57  self::$sessionInstance->set($arrayKey, $array );
58  return false;
59  }
60  }
61 
71  public static function removeValueFromArray($arrayKey, $value) {
72  return self::addOrRemoveValueFromArray ( $arrayKey, $value, false );
73  }
74 
84  public static function addValueToArray($arrayKey, $value) {
85  return self::addOrRemoveValueFromArray ( $arrayKey, $value, true );
86  }
87 
97  public static function setBoolean($key, $value) {
98  return self::$sessionInstance->set($key,UString::isBooleanTrue ( $value ));
99  }
100 
108  public static function getBoolean($key) {
109  $v= self::$sessionInstance->get($key,false);
110  return UString::isBooleanTrue ( $v);
111  }
112 
122  public static function session($key, $default = NULL) {
123  return self::$sessionInstance->get($key,$default);
124  }
125 
135  public static function get($key, $default = NULL) {
136  return self::$sessionInstance->get($key,$default);
137  }
138 
146  public static function set($key, $value) {
147  return self::$sessionInstance->set($key,$value);
148  }
149 
150  public static function setTmp($key, $value, $duration) {
151  if (self::$sessionInstance->exists($key)) {
152  $object = self::$sessionInstance->get($key);
153  if ($object instanceof SessionObject) {
154  return $object->setValue ( $value );
155  }
156  }
157  $object = new SessionObject ( $value, $duration );
158  return self::$sessionInstance->set($key, $object);
159  }
160 
161  public static function getTmp($key, $default = null) {
162  if (self::$sessionInstance->exists($key)) {
163  $object = self::$sessionInstance->get($key);
164  if ($object instanceof SessionObject) {
165  $value = $object->getValue ();
166  if (isset ( $value ))
167  return $object->getValue ();
168  else {
169  self::delete ( $key );
170  }
171  }
172  }
173  return $default;
174  }
175 
176  public static function getTimeout($key) {
177  if (self::$sessionInstance->exists($key)) {
178  $object = self::$sessionInstance->get($key);
179  if ($object instanceof SessionObject) {
180  $value = $object->getTimeout ();
181  if ($value < 0) {
182  return 0;
183  } else {
184  return $value;
185  }
186  }
187  }
188  return;
189  }
190 
197  public static function delete($key) {
198  self::$sessionInstance->delete($key);
199  }
200 
208  public static function inc($key, $inc = 1) {
209  return self::set ( $key, self::get ( $key, 0 ) + $inc );
210  }
211 
219  public static function dec($key, $dec = 1) {
220  return self::set ( $key, self::get ( $key, 0 ) - $dec );
221  }
222 
230  public static function concat($key, $str, $default = NULL) {
231  return self::set ( $key, self::get ( $key, $default ) . $str );
232  }
233 
241  public static function apply($key, $callback, $default = NULL) {
242  $value = self::get ( $key, $default );
243  if (is_string ( $callback ) && function_exists ( $callback )) {
244  $value = call_user_func ( $callback, $value );
245  } elseif (is_callable ( $callback )) {
246  $value = $callback ( $value );
247  } else {
248  return $value;
249  }
250  return self::set ( $key, $value );
251  }
252 
260  public static function Walk($callback, $userData = null) {
261  $all=self::$sessionInstance->getAll();
262  foreach ($all as $k=>$v){
263  self::$sessionInstance->set($k, $callback($k,$v,$userData));
264  }
265  return self::$sessionInstance->getAll();
266  }
267 
274  public static function replace($keyAndValues) {
275  foreach ($keyAndValues as $k=>$v){
276  self::$sessionInstance->set($k, $v);
277  }
278  return self::$sessionInstance->getAll();
279  }
280 
286  public static function getAll() {
287  return self::$sessionInstance->getAll();
288  }
289 
296  public static function start($name = null) {
297  if(!isset(self::$sessionInstance)){
298  self::$sessionInstance=Startup::getSessionInstance();
299  }
300  self::$sessionInstance->start($name);
301  }
302 
308  public static function isStarted() {
309  return self::$sessionInstance->isStarted();
310  }
311 
319  public static function exists($key) {
320  return self::$sessionInstance->exists($key);
321  }
322 
330  public static function init($key, $value) {
331  if (! self::$sessionInstance->exists($key)) {
332  self::$sessionInstance->set($key, $value);
333  }
334  return self::$sessionInstance->get($key);
335  }
336 
340  public static function terminate() {
341  self::$sessionInstance->terminate();
342  }
343 }
